info.title: Lifestyle
info.description: Get tips on travel, workouts, style, food, and more

display.name: KAYAK - Flights, Hotels & Cars
display.description: Your travel planning assistant for flights, hotels, & cars
prompt_starters: How much is a boutique hotel in New York?
When's the best time to travel to Tokyo in summer?
How much does it cost to fly to San Francisco?
Where can I travel for $500?

info.title: KAYAK - Flights, Hotels, Cars
info.description: A plugin that allows users to search for the best deals on flights, hotels and cars

post.summary: Search flights on a flight route for certain dates
Search rental cars for certain dates
Find places to go on a budget. This endpoint will return destinations that can be reached by plane within the given budget.

This endpoint can be used when the flight route is known yet the travel dates are flexible. For example a user may say they want to travel for 2 weeks whenever air fares are the lowest. Another example is that a user specifies a travel month without exact dates.

origin.description: The origin from which the flight starts. Will be approximated if not specified.

destination.description: The destination to which the flight goes

departDate.description: Departure date of the flight at the origin

departHourRange.description: Range of hours in between which the outgoing flight should depart. Hours between 0 and 23, ranges such as [12,14]. Only needed when a specific flight departure time is requested.

returnDate.description: Return date of the flight. Only required for round trip flights

returnHourRange.description: Range of hours in between which the return flight should depart. Hours between 0 and 23, ranges such as [12,14]. Only needed when a specific return flight departure time is requested.

cabinClass.description: Flight cabin class. Defaults to Economy class if not specified.

numAdults.description: Number of adults that are flying

numChildren.description: Number of children that are flying

preferredCarriers.description: Optional list of airlines that are preferred.

excludeCarriers.description: Optional list of airlines that should be avoided.

destination.description: The city where you need a stay

hotelName.description: Name of the specific hotel for which the user wants to search. Optional only required when a specific hotel is requested.

landmark.description: Optional landmark to refine the location

neighborhood.description: Optional neighborhood to refine the location

address.description: Optional address to refine the location

numAdults.description: Number of adults that are staying.

numChildren.description: Number of children that are staying

minNumStars.description: Minimum number of stars the accommodation should have

specialRequest.description: Any question or preference related to the accommodation for which we have no explicit query parameters.

preferredAmenities.description:
Specify one or many amenities that the accommodation should offer: 
- spa: Spa
- pool: Pool
- pet_friendly: Pet-friendly
- beach_front: At the beach front
- fitness_center: Fitness center
- kitchen: Kitchen
- parking: Parking
- adult_only: Adult-only accommodation
- wifi: Wi-Fi
- ev_charger: Charger for electric vehicles
- facilities_disabled_guests: Facilities for guests with disabilities
- elevator: Elevator

preferredFreebies.description:
Specify one or many freebies that should be included in the room rate:
- free_cancellation: Rate includes free cancellation
- free_breakfast: Rate includes breakfast
- free_internet: Rate includes free Internet access
- all_inclusive: All-inclusive rate

preferredClassifications.description:
Specify one or many classifications that allow us to understand better what kind of experience the user is looking for:
- bed_and_breakfast: Bed and breakfast
- motel: Motel
- inn: Inn
- capsule_hotel: Capsule hotel
- apartment: Apartment
- villa: Villa
- ryokan: Ryokan
- hostel: Hostel
- cottage: Cottage
- holiday_home: Holiday home

preferredAmbiances.description:
Specify one or many ambiances that allow us to understand better what kind of experience the user is looking for:
- boutique: Boutique hotel
- budget: Hotels that are budget-friendly
- romantic: Hotels suited for romantic trips
- historic: Hotels with a historic character
- family_friendly: Family-friendly accommodations

origin.description: The location where you want to pick your rental car

destination.description: The location where you want to drop off your rental car. Will take the origin if no other location is given.

pickupDate.description: The date when you want to pick up your rental car

pickupHour.description: Rental car pick up hour in 24-hour format. Optional parameter that defaults to noon.

dropoffDate.description: The date when you want to drop off your rental car

dropoffHour.description: Rental car drop off hour in 24-hour format. Optional parameter that defaults to noon.

origin.description: The origin from which the flight starts. Will be approximated if not specified.

destinationHints.description: Optional list of cities that are requested to be included in the results, if prices are available.

departDate.description: Departure date of the flight at the origin

returnDate.description: Return date of the flight. Must be specified when a departure date is given.

budgetUsd.description: Expected cost of round trip flight ticket for one person

useExactDates.description: Set to true if travel on specific dates is requested. The default is flexible travel within a time period.

minDays.description: Minimum duration that the suggested trips should have. Expressed in the number of days

maxDays.description: Maximum duration that the suggested trips should have. Expressed in the number of days

origin.description: The origin from which the flight starts. Will be approximated if not specified.

destination.description: The destination to which the flight goes

departDate.description: Departure date of the flight at the origin

returnDate.description: Return date of the flight. Only required for round trip flights

nonStopOnly.description: Only show non-stop pricing if non-stop flights are available on the requested route

display.name: Push this Red Button
prompt_starters: Press here

display.name: Rizz GPT
display.description: Your go-to dating message expert, ready to boost your charm!
prompt_starters: What's a flirty reply to this message?
Write a first message that will keep the conversation flowing
suggestions for a successful profile picture on my dating profile
Generate a catchy bio for my dating profile.

display.name: Books
display.description: Your AI guide in the world of literature and reading.
prompt_starters: Can you recommend a book for a rainy day?
What's a good historical fiction novel?
I love mysteries, any suggestions?
Tell me about a classic novel I should read.

display.name: Healthy Chef
display.description: Recipe creator with visual and nutritional insights.
prompt_starters: What can I cook with these ingredients?
Show me a healthy recipe for these items.
Can you suggest a recipe and its image?
Create a dish using these ingredients.

info.title: Spoonacular API
info.description: API for fetching recipes, ingredients, and nutrition facts from Spoonacular.

get.description: Fetch a list of recipes based on query parameters.
Fetch detailed information about an ingredient.
Fetch nutrition facts for a specific recipe.

display.name: DeepGame
display.description: Play any story as a character. You decide what to do next. AI generates a new image for each step to enhance immersion.
prompt_starters: New Game
Custom Plot
Play a fantasy story
Suggest Scenarios
Play a detective story
Set Language

display.name: Home Style Advisor
display.description: Analyzes home photos, suggests decor matching style, and uses DALL-E for visual ideas.
prompt_starters: What can I do to refresh my kitchen's look?
I'd like a more relaxing bedroom, any ideas?
How should I arrange my living room for a modern feel?
Can you suggest decor for my home office?

display.name: Tax AI - Save Tax Faster
display.description: Save, Earn, Learn with Taxabl. Ask anything tax in just a few words.
prompt_starters: Tax Expert
Write-off Finder
IRS Form Assistant
$100 tax challenge
Design my 2024 tax plan
Text the CEO

display.name: What should I watch?
display.description: Find movies and tv shows to watch based on your taste and preferences, goodbye decision paralysis!
prompt_starters: What genre are you in the mood for?
List your top 5 favorite movies.
Which actors do you love watching?
Look at my Letterboxd favorites and then learn about my preferences and find me something to watch!

display.name: PlaylistAI - Music Playlist Maker
display.description: Connect your Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon Music, or Deezer account to create music playlists in your library.
prompt_starters: Create a workout playlist for me.
I need a relaxing playlist for reading.
Can you make a playlist for a road trip?
Use DALL·E to make a cover image for my playlist.

post.description: Endpoint to create a playlist based on provided song names and title.

requestBody.description: Song names and title to create a playlist

songNames.description: Comma separated list of song and artist names in this format: <song name> - <artist name>

title.description: A suggested title for the playlist

playlistPrompt.description: A copy of the prompt the user entered to create the playlist

429.description: The user exceeded the number of playlists that they can create for free. Read them the paymentUrl

paymentUrl.description: The url to go to to purchase unlimited playlists

supportEmail.description: The support email that the user can contact for help or questions

message.description: A message that should be read to the user

get.summary: Get songs from a Spotify playlist
get.description: Retrieve songs from a given Spotify playlist URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to a playlist on the Spotify platform.

items.description: Song in the format of <song name> - <artist name>

error.description: Error message indicating the playlist was not found.

get.summary: Fetches the playlists for the current user on Spotify and returns the playlist name and link for each playlist.
get.description: Fetches the playlists for the current user on Spotify and returns the playlist name and link for each playlist.

link.description: Link to the playlist on Spotify

get.summary: Fetches a URL to manage or cancel the user's subscription to PlaylistAI

message.description: A message about managing the subscription

billingPortalURL.description: A URL that the user can go to to manage their subscription

customerSupportEmail.description: An email address to contact if you need further help

post.summary: Add songs to a Spotify playlist
post.description: Adds specified songs to a Spotify playlist based on the provided playlist URL and song names.

playlistUrl.description: A URL to the playlist to update

songNames.description: Names of the songs to add in this format "<song name> - <artist name>"

post.summary: Removes songs from a Spotify playlist
post.description: Removes specified songs from a Spotify playlist based on the provided playlist URL and song names.

playlistUrl.description: A URL to the playlist to update

songNames.description: Names of the songs to remove in this format "<song name> - <artist name>"

post.description: Endpoint to create a playlist based on provided song names and title.

requestBody.description: Song names and title to create a playlist

songNames.description: Comma separated list of song and artist names in this format: <song name> - <artist name>

title.description: A suggested title for the playlist

playlistPrompt.description: A copy of the prompt the user entered to create the playlist

200.description: The playlist was successfully created in the user's Apple Music account. They have to go to their Apple Music playlists to listen to it.

playlistName.description: The name of the new playlist in the user's Apple Music Library.

403.description: The user needs to visit the authorization url to grant Apple Music permissions before making a playlist

authorizationUrl.description: The url for the user to visit to grant Apple Music Permissions

message.description: A message giving context about the error

429.description: The user exceeded the number of playlists that they can create for free. Read them the paymentUrl

paymentUrl.description: The url to go to to purchase unlimited playlists

supportEmail.description: The support email that the user can contact for help or questions

message.description: A message that should be read to the user
